pages.text: This is a Sewing Table. $(br)You can use it in order to add/remove insulaiton to/from your armor.

Adding Insulation:$(br)Put armor in upper slot and insulaiton in lower one in order to add insulaiton to your armor.$(br)$(br)Removing Insulation:$(br)Put armor in upper slot and shears in lower one in order to remove insulaiton from your armor.$(br)
